## Teaching and supervision

### Modules at UHOH

  * [Quantitative Methods in Economics](https://ilias.uni-hohenheim.de/goto.php?target=crs_93188&client_id=UHOH)
    * Research designs, sampling, statistical analyses, matching methods - with applications in STATA
  * [Poverty and Development Strategies](https://ilias.uni-hohenheim.de/goto.php?target=crs_54514&client_id=UHOH)
    * Role of agriculture in development and agricultural development policy instruments
  * [Monitoring and Evaluation of Rural Development Projects](https://ilias.uni-hohenheim.de/goto.php?target=crs_400376&client_id=UHOH)
    * Impact evaluation, financial and economic appraisal of rural development projects
  * [Rural Development Policies and Institutions](https://ilias.uni-hohenheim.de/goto.php?target=crs_58826&client_id=UHOH)
    * Agricultural value chains and producer organizations as a form of collective action
